abstract: The U.S. aircraft-maker posted its largest quarterly profit in nearly four years on the strength of its airplane business.
snippet: The U.S. aircraft-maker posted its largest quarterly profit in nearly four years on the strength of its airplane business.
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, July 25  (AP) — The Boeing Company posted its largest quarterly profit in nearly four years on Wednesday, earning $1.1 billion as it continued to build momentum against its European rival, Airbus.
